meanings.sent1: The dark clouds foreshow a storm approaching.

meanings.definition: A sign or indication of something to come
meanings.sent1: The black cat crossing their path was a foreshow of bad luck.
meanings.sent2: The sudden drop in temperature was a foreshow of winter's arrival.
meanings.sent3: The shooting star was a foreshow of good fortune.
meanings.sent4: The rainbow was a foreshow of the storm passing.
meanings.sent5: The blooming flowers were a foreshow of spring's beauty.
